page.title: 16Local facilities-Guisborough
page.content: In our survey of 50 parents (see last page)18 specified road planning;12, parks;10,bus services, as amenities they felt were bad.Commended by most were health centres & primary schools. 23 said they'd seen improvement in local facs. in recent years. Facs.for the young & narrow roads (town centre congestion) were also mentioned.We asked if Guisb.C should have bought the large Georgian'Sunnyfield House' on Westgate as a community centre last year;28 said yes;20: no, a waste of money.On congestion,43 wanted a by- pass round the town to the N; 3 felt it would make for a loss of trade.The heavy traffic on Sats & in holiday season,affecting the town centre,was much mentioned.Another complaint was lack of shops,etc.in outlying housing estates.But,all in all,people like living in Guisborough!
